enableOverlay.name: Enable Movement Overlay
enableOverlay.hint: Toggle the visual overlay on/off. Can also be toggled via hotkey (Default: 'M').

movementRounding.name: Grid Movement Rounding Rule
movementRounding.hint: Determines if a unit can enter a square if they lack the full movement cost.

choices.any: Permissive: Enter if ANY movement remains (> 0)
choices.half: Standard: Enter if > 50% of grid cost remains
choices.full: Strict: Enter only if FULL grid cost remains (100%)

experimentalHex.name: Enable Experimental Hex Support
experimentalHex.hint: Hex grids can cause pathfinding leaks in walled dungeons. Enable only for open maps.

experimentalGridless.name: Enable Experimental Gridless Support
experimentalGridless.hint: Gridless mode uses direct distance (as the crow flies) and ignores walls. Best for open fields.

overlayOpacity.name: Overlay Opacity
overlayOpacity.hint: Transparency of the movement grid (0.0 = transparent, 1.0 = solid).

showDistanceLabels.name: Show Distance Labels
showDistanceLabels.hint: Display the distance cost (e.g., '15 ft') on every grid square.

toggleOverlay.name: Toggle Movement Overlay
toggleOverlay.hint: Shows or hides the RMU movement range finder.

resetAnchor.name: Reset Movement Anchor
resetAnchor.hint: Resets the starting 'Anchor' point to the token's current position. Use this when starting a new turn or movement segment.
